verses.verse: Why do the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7283>rage,<s%> and the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> <S%H1897>plot<s%> a vain <S%H7385>thing?<s%>

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> take a <S%H3320>stand,<s%> and the <S%H7336>rulers<s%> take <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and against his <S%H4899>Anointed,<s%> saying,
<S%H5423>"Let<s%>'s break their <S%H4147>bonds<s%> <S%H5423>apart,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> their cords from <S%H4147>us.<s%>"
He who <S%H3427>sits<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H7832>laugh.<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> will have them in <S%H3932>derision.<s%>
Then he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them in his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H926>terrify<s%> them in his <S%H2740>wrath:<s%>
"Yet I have <S%H5258>set<s%> my <S%H4428>King<s%> on my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>"
I will <S%H5608>tell<s%> of the <S%H2706>decree.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> "You are my son. <S%H3117>Today<s%> I have become your <S%H3205>father.<s%>

<S%H7592>Ask<s%> of <S%H5414>me,<s%> and I will give the <S%H1471>nations<s%> for your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> the uttermost <S%H657>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for your <S%H272>possession.<s%>
You shall <S%H7489>break<s%> them with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%> You shall dash them in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> like a <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>"
Now therefore be <S%H7919>wise,<s%> you <S%H4428>kings.<s%> Be <S%H3256>instructed,<s%> you <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Give sincere <S%H5401>homage<s%> to the <S%H1248>Son,<s%> lest he be <S%H599>angry,<s%> and you <S%H6>perish<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> for his <S%H639>wrath<s%> will soon <S%H4592>be<s%> <S%H1197>kindled.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are all those who take refuge in <S%H2620>him.<s%>
